job.title: Software Development Engineer in Test
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: dice is the leading career destination for tech experts at every stage of their careers our client prosum is seeking the following apply via dice todayltbrgtltbrgtsoftware development engineer in test sdet automationperformance engineer will work with software quality assurance development teams to design develop and execute system test solutions that include automation and performance testing as part of the solution key responsibilities be a team member on the automation testing team api functional systems and gui testing of products execute maintain and extend test coverage for the automation suite familiar with automation tools such as selenium and performance tools such as jmeter experience with at least one oopl preferably java and familiar with other languages such as javascript python or groovy define and track quality assurance metrics such as defect densities and open defect counts communicate information effectively crossfunctionally provide qa support to internal customers as necessary increase the automation coverage based on highrisk areas defined with the team overall responsibility of performance engineering and performance testing tasks for engaged projects including strategy estimation planning execution oversight metrics reporting and risk management bottomline responsibility for providing thought leadership and expertise concerning nonfunctional testing for the team its members and the deliverables responsible for selectingmaintaining and integrating the appropriate set of tools processes and procedures to ensure overall testing efficiency and effectiveness in the operations makes sure that the test cases are developed according to the identified test scenarios and test objectives that are in line with the service level agreements specified in the nonfunctional requirements documents identify recommend and implement framework strategies and toolsets to optimize test execution expand test coverage and reduce risk produce and maintain key performance indicators kpis around the testing performed manage bestinclass service quality and manage slaolas accordingly lead a continuous process improvement program within the team and at the project level reviewing trends data etc partner with technical product ownerscrum master in the development of plans status communications and the management of development software solutions monitor quality risks and escalate as required provide regular status reporting consistent with established program governance requirements single point of contact for all deliverables from the performance engineering and performance testing team lead the analysis with development on the current technology implementation modification activities and bugs make recommendations for solution improvements
